item.title: Behavioral Characteristics of Bone Marrow Registrants and Stem Cell Donors
item.description:
Journal of Behavioral Economics and Finance, 13, pp.32-52, 2020. [Full-text link]

This paper is written in Japanese. English abstract is available at our working paper version.
